test_claims.text: The Earth is flat and NASA has been hiding this for decades.
COVID-19 vaccines contain microchips for tracking people.
Climate change is primarily caused by human activities according to 97% of climate scientists.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space with the naked eye.
5G towers cause cancer and spread viruses.
Water fluoridation is a safe public health measure that reduces tooth decay.
Government confirms alien contact and cover-up since 1947.
